comments.creator: passfree@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.15 Safari/535.2

Steps to reproduce:

Firefox has browser/cert/aboutCertError.xhtml page which is used to handle certificate problems in a simular graphical way as about:neterror. While about:neterror is part of pippki and therefore available in xulrunner, aboutCertError.xhtml (about:certerror) is only available in Firefox which is a bit inconsistent and tremendous pain as this feature needs to be reimplemented everywhere.



Expected results:

I think we should move aboutCertError.xhtml into pippki in order to be consistent with the overal design of the mozilla platform.
comments.author: passfree@gmail.com

comments.creator: passfree@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Any feedback if this can be incorporated into pippki?
